name: A Unique Game Where You Chase Away Wolves And Tend Sheep
name_original: A Unique Game Where You Chase Away Wolves And Tend Sheep
description:
Your flock of sheep have scattered all over the pasture. It is your job as a hard-working shepherd's dog to collect them back to the safety of the fence. But hurry! Sheep are easy prey for the wolves. Do whatever it takes to scare off these hungry canines. 

Music:
Sebastian Perry Ferrera
bandlab.com/sebby_nalang

Art:
Marco Gaspar
